name: Sentinel

skills.name: Hook
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Damage is proportional to ATK and DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK] [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10'
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15

skills.name: Glaive Swing
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.raw_description: Heals this Champion by 10% HP at the start of each turn. This Heal can be critical.
